text:
if ant is run with the "-verbose" or "-debug" option, when hitting 
org.apache.tools.ant.Diagnostics.validateVersion() with

<<Invalid implementation version between Ant core and Ant optional tasks.
 core    : 1.7.0
 optional: 1.7>>

... say where the jar files causing this are located or at least print ant's classpath
creator: hauser@acm.org

text: svn revision 798399 prints the location information.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
